name: Pure Evil
description: [i]Starting Ambition[/i] Play a card from the Villain Deck. Keep this card in the Ambition Row. (This card starts the game in the Ambition Row and cannot be discarded from the Ambition Row. You can use this card multiple times in the same turn.)[/i]

name: Crackdown
description: Choose a class. Each other player reveals their hand and discards all cards of that class.

name: Tide of Destruction
description: Play two cards from the Villain Deck.

name: Abduction
description: Put a Hero from the HQ on the bottom of the Hero Deck.

name: Secret Plans
description: Put this card under a Villain in the Sewers or Bank. When that Villain escapes, this card becomes a Scheme Twist that takes effect immediately. If that Villain leaves the city another way, discard this.

name: Wipe Out
description: Choose a class. Put all heroes of that class from the HQ on the bottom of the Hero Deck.

name: Crush the Weak
description: The other player with the fewest Villains in their Victory Pile gains a Wound. [i](You choose how to break a tie.)[/i]

name: Identity Theft
description: Each other player that has exactly six cards reveals a [BGCOLOR=#000000][COLOR=#FFFFFF]Tech[/COLOR][/BGCOLOR] Hero or puts two cards from their hand on top of their deck.

name: Wave of Punishment
description: Each other player reveals a [BGCOLOR=#0000FF][COLOR=#FFFFFF]Ranged[/COLOR][/BGCOLOR] Hero or gains a Wound to the bottom of their deck.

name: Force Field
description: Put this card under the Mastermind card. That Mastermind gets +3 Attack until the start of your next turn. Then, discard this card.

name: Breakout
description: Choose a Villain from the Escape Pile. It enters the city.

name: Last-Minute Escape
description: Pick a random Mastermind Tactic from all the ones in players' Victory Piles. Shuffle it back into the Mastermind's Tactics.

name: Empower
description: Put this card under a Villain in the city. Until the start of your next turn, that Villain gets +3 Attack. Then, discard this card.

name: Deceive
description: Each other player reveals a [BGCOLOR=#FF0000][COLOR=#FFFFFF]Covert[/COLOR][/BGCOLOR] Hero or discards their hand and draws five cards.

name: Inflict Pain
description: Each other player puts a Wound from their discard pile on top of their deck.

name: Bank Robbery
description: KO the Hero in the HQ space under the Bank. You get + Recruit equal to that Hero's printed Recruit.

name: Pressure Point
description: Each other player reveals a [BGCOLOR=#CC9900][COLOR=#FFFFFF]Instinct[/COLOR][/BGCOLOR] Hero or gains a Wound to the top of their deck.

name: Cleave
description: Choose a number besides 0. Each other player reveals their hand and discards all cards of that cost.

name: Entrap
description: Put this card on a Hero in the HQ. Players can't recruit that Hero until the start of your next turn. Then, discard this card.

name: Insane Twist
description: This card becomes a Scheme Twist that takes effect immediately.

name: Kidnap
description: A Villain in the city captures a Bystander.

name: Thirst for Power
description: Reveal the top two cards of the Villain Deck. Play a Scheme Twist you revealed. Put the rest back on the top and/or bottom in any order.

name: Painful Choice
description: Each other player chooses Recruit or Attack, then discard all their cards with that icon.

name: Crime Surge
description: Each Villain on the Rooftops and Streets captures a Bystander.

name: Dark Apprentice
description: Add a random new Mastermind to the game with one Tactic.

name: Collateral Damage
description: Each other player KOs a Bystander from their Victory Pile or gains a Wound.

name: Ruthless Strike
description: This card becomes a Master Strike that takes effect immediately.

name: Infiltrate S.H.I.E.L.D.
description: Choose a 0-cost Hero from the KO pile for each other player. Those players gain those Heroes.

name: Thirst for Vengeance
description: Reveal the top two cards of the Villain Deck. Play a Master Strike you revealed. Put the rest back on the top and/or bottom in any order.

name: Pummel
description: Each other player reveals a [BGCOLOR=#009933][COLOR=#FFFFFF]Strength[/COLOR][/BGCOLOR] Hero or gains a Wound.

name: Puzzle Trap
description: Choose a class. Other players can't recruit heroes of that class until the start of your next turn. Then, discard this card.

name: Seize the High Ground
description: [b]Patrol the Rooftops:[/b] If there's a Villain there, then all Villains everywhere get +1 Attack until the start of your next turn. Then, discard this card.

name: Hostage Situation
description: [b]Patrol the Streets:[/b] If there's a Villain there, then each Villain in the city captures a Bystander.

name: This is a Stickup
description: [b]Patrol the Bank:[/b] If there's a Villain there, each other player reveals their hand and discards a card with a Recruit icon.

name: Shadowy Disciple
description: This ambition ascends to become a new 9 Attack Mastermind worth 5 VP. It gains the ability: "[b]Master Strike[/b]: Each player reveals a [BGCOLOR=#0000FF][COLOR=#FFFFFF]Ranged[/COLOR][/BGCOLOR] Hero or gains a Wound."

name: Detonate the Bridge
description: [b]Patrol the Bridge:[/b] If there's a Villain there, each player gains a Wound.

name: Short Escape Tunnels
description: [b]Patrol the Sewers:[/b] If there's a Villain there, it escapes.

name: Crazed Charge
description: A Villain in the city [b]charges[/b] two spaces.

name: Devastate S.H.I.E.L.D.
description: Every other player reveals their hand and discards all their cards that cost 0.

name: Rack and Ruin
description: This card becomes a Master Strike that takes effect immediately. Then, this card becomes a Scheme Twist that takes effect immediately.
